text:
Jacobus Teunis "Koos" van den Berg (18 September 1942 – 21 April 2020) was a Dutch politician. He was born in The Hague. He was a member of the Reformed Political Party (SGP). He served as a member of the House of Representatives from 1986 to 2002.
On 21 April 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic, van den Berg died due to the disease. He was 77.
